text.div:
This code system http://ehealth.hl7.org/CodeSystem/data-access-categories defines the following codes:

LvlCodeDisplayDefinition
1summary SummaryPatient Summary
2  sm-name NameThe patient's name
2  sm-address AddressThe patient's address
2  sm-contact-info Contact InfoContact information of the patient
2  sm-contact-persons Contact Persons (Non-Therapeutic)Non-therapeutic contact persons associated with the patient
2  sm-gmf-holder GMF HolderThe patient's General Medical File (GMF) holder
2  sm-healthcare-professionals Healthcare Professionals Treating the PatientHealthcare professionals involved in treating the patient
2  sm-adverse-drug-reaction Adverse Drug ReactionRecorded adverse drug reactions of the patient
2  sm-allergies AllergiesKnown allergies of the patient
2  sm-social-risks Social RisksSocial risks or determinants of health associated with the patient
2  sm-risks RisksMedical risks or potential health risks associated with the patient
2  sm-problems ProblemsHealth problems or conditions of the patient
2  sm-treatments TreatmentsMedical treatments received by the patient
2  sm-patient-will Patient WillPatient's expressed wishes or advance directives
1med-scheme1 Medication SchemeMedication Scheme
1med-scheme2 Medication Scheme 2Medication Scheme 2
1med-prescription Medication PrescriptionMedication Prescription
1lab-result Lab resultsLab results
1discharge-report Discharge Report/Contact ReportSummary data related to discharge report or contact report
2  dr-physician PhysicianSummary data related to physicians
3    dr-p-all-depts All DepartmentsSummary data related to physicians in all departments
3    dr-p-psy PsychiatrySummary data related to physicians in psychiatry department
3    dr-p-gyn GynecologySummary data related to physicians in gynecology department
3    dr-p-max-fac MaxillofacialSummary data related to physicians in maxillofacial department
2  dr-nurse NurseSummary data related to nurses
3    dr-n-all-depts All DepartmentsSummary data related to nurses in all departments
3    dr-n-gyn GynecologySummary data related to nurses in gynecology department
3    dr-n-psy PsychiatrySummary data related to nurses in psychiatry department
2  midwife MidwifeSummary data related to midwives
3    dr-m-all-depts All DepartmentsSummary data related to midwives in all departments
3    dr-m-gyn GynecologySummary data related to midwives in gynecology department
1result-of-other-technical-examination Result of Other Technical ExaminationSummary data related to the results of other technical examinations
2  oth-physician PhysicianSummary data related to physicians
3    oth-p-all-depts All DepartmentsSummary data related to physicians in all departments
3    oth-p-psy PsychiatrySummary data related to physicians in psychiatry department
3    oth-p-rx RadiologySummary data related to physicians in radiology department
3    oth-p-nucl-med Nuclear MedicineSummary data related to physicians in nuclear medicine department
3    oth-p-cardio CardiologySummary data related to physicians in cardiology department
3    oth-p-gyn GynecologySummary data related to physicians in gynecology department
3    oth-p-dental DentalSummary data related to physicians in dental department
3    oth-p-stoma StomatologySummary data related to physicians in stomatology department
3    oth-p-max-fac MaxillofacialSummary data related to physicians in maxillofacial department
1notes-journal Journal NotesJournal Notes

name: DataAccessCategories
title: Data Access categories
description: Data Access categories - the rolestypes of data that are associated with specifica authorization rules
